member.name: M:Electroimpact.SettingsFormBuilder.frmSettings.createTree(System.Object@,System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode,Electroimpact.SettingsFormBuilder.cField)
member.summary: Creates the tree (left hand side) and panel (right hand side) of setting information. This is a recursive function.
member.param: The setting object to create the settings window from. Usually a class containing multiple pieces of setting information.
Pass null for a new window
The name to display for the node. For a new window pass the name of the root node.
